title: Bulletin of the Chicago Academy of Sciences
additional-notes: Spot checks of issues up to the 1980s did not turn up copyright notices, but we did find one on a mid-1990s issue.

Some issues of this serial may have distinctive titles. Before concluding such issues are in the public domain, search for renewals for books under those titles.  We have not systematically done such searches for this serial.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Pete Sullivan for copyright research on this title.
